quotes.text: I've failed over and over and over again in my life, and that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Push yourself again and again. Don't give an inch until the final buzzer sounds.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.text: Ask not what your teammates can do for you. Ask what you can do for your teammates.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.text: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.text: I think team first. It allows me to succeed, it allows my team to succeed.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: If you are afraid of failure, you don’t deserve to be successful!
quotes.author: Charles Barkley

quotes.text: The true test of a man’s character is what he does when no one is watching.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: A team is like a chain. It is only as strong as its weakest link.
quotes.author: Chuck Daly

quotes.text: A basketball team is like the five fingers on your hand. If you can get them all together, you have a fist. That’s how I want you to play.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.text: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.text: It’s awesome, baby, with a capital A!
quotes.author: Dick Vitale

quotes.text: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Great players are willing to give up their own personal achievement for the achievement of the group. It enhances everybody.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.text: Hard work is not punishment. Hard work is the price of admission for the opportunity to reach sustained excellence.
quotes.author: Jay Bilas

quotes.text: Good teams become great ones when the members trust each other enough to surrender the ‘me’ for the ‘we.’
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.text: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.text: Discipline yourself, and others won’t need to.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Don't look back. Something might be gaining on you.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.text: When you lose, don't lose the lesson.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.text: Basketball is like photography, if you don’t focus, all you have is the negative.
quotes.author: Dan Frisby

quotes.text: Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: The best teams have chemistry. They communicate with each other and they sacrifice personal glory for the common goal.
quotes.author: Dave DeBusschere

quotes.text: If you quit once it becomes a habit. Never quit!
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Winning takes talent, to repeat takes character.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. Until your good is better and your better is best.
quotes.author: Tim Duncan

quotes.text: You can’t get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good.
quotes.author: Jerry West

quotes.text: Great things come from hard work and perseverance. No excuses.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.text: Nothing is given. Everything is earned.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Do your best when no one is looking. If you do that, then you can be successful in anything that you put your mind to.
quotes.author: Bob Cousy

quotes.text: Don’t be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: Teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.text: Make each day your masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Never give up! Failure and rejection are only the first step to succeeding.
quotes.author: Jim Valvano

quotes.text: Effort is the only thing you can control. The rest is up to someone else.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.text: What you are as a person is far more important than what you are as a basketball player.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Play to win, not to avoid losing.
quotes.author: Chuck Daly

quotes.text: Excellence is not a singular act, but a habit. You are what you repeatedly do.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quotes.text: You don't have to be the best player, but you can be the hardest worker.
quotes.author: Derek Fisher

quotes.text: Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Great effort springs naturally from great attitude.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.text: A player's legacy isn't just in the banners, but in how they made their teammates better.
quotes.author: Bill Simmons

quotes.text: The best moments in basketball are when the team performs as one.
quotes.author: Jackie MacMullan

quotes.text: Basketball, more than any other sport, is a dynamic combination of grace and power.
quotes.author: Bob Ryan

quotes.text: The game of basketball has been everything to me. My place of refuge, place I've always gone where I needed comfort and peace.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: A winner is someone who recognizes his God-given talents, works his tail off to develop them into skills, and uses these skills to accomplish his goals.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.text: The magic in basketball is not in winning or losing, but in the love of the game itself.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.text: Basketball is a beautiful game when the five players on the court play with one heartbeat.
quotes.author: Dean Smith

quotes.text: I’ll do whatever it takes to win games, whether it’s sitting on a bench waving a towel, handing a cup of water to a teammate, or hitting the game-winning shot.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.text: Good basketball always starts with good defense!
quotes.author: Bob Knight

quotes.text: Winning is about having the whole team on the same page.
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.text: Basketball is more than just a sport. It’s a way of life.
quotes.author: Allen Iverson

quotes.text: You don’t play against opponents, you play against the game of basketball.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.text: Once you are labeled ‘the best’ you want to stay up there, and you can’t do it by loafing around.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.text: In basketball, as in life, there is no substitution for hard work.
quotes.author: Kevin Durant

quotes.text: Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Basketball is the closest thing to poetry in motion.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.text: Hard work doesn’t guarantee success, but improves its chances.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.text: Teamwork is the key to success in basketball. No one can win alone.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.text: Basketball doesn’t build character. It reveals it.
quotes.author: James Naismith

quotes.text: I treated it like every day was my last day with a basketball.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: Leadership is diving for a loose ball. It’s about being able to take it as well as dish it out. That’s the only way you’re going to get respect from the players.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.text: Everybody has talent, but ability takes hard work.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Love the game of basketball and it will love you back.
quotes.author: Carmelo Anthony

quotes.text: Basketball is a team game. But that doesn’t mean all five players should have the same amount of shots.
quotes.author: Dean Smith

quotes.text: Don’t measure yourself by what you have accomplished, but by what you should have accomplished with your ability.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Basketball is like war in that offensive weapons are developed first, and it always takes a while for the defense to catch up.
quotes.author: Red Auerbach

quotes.text: Defense is what wins championships.
quotes.author: Gregg Popovich

quotes.text: When you are not practicing, someone else is getting better.
quotes.author: Allen Iverson

quotes.text: Talent is never enough. With few exceptions, the best players are the hardest workers.
quotes.author: Kevin Garnett

quotes.text: A coach is someone who can give correction without causing resentment.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Work ethic eliminates fear.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: The game is my wife. It demands loyalty and responsibility, and it gives me back fulfillment and peace.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: In basketball, you need a sense of timing and a sense of where you are at all times.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.text: The idea is not to block every shot. The idea is to make your opponent believe that you might block every shot.
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.text: I think the basketball gods will reward you if you sacrifice everything for the game.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.text: Basketball is a game of habits, and it takes time to create them.
quotes.author: Oscar Robertson

quotes.text: What you learn from the game of basketball is that no matter how good your individual skills are, you’ve got to play within a team framework.
quotes.author: Tim Duncan

quotes.text: Passion is the fuel that drives success in basketball.
quotes.author: Dwyane Wade

quotes.text: Practice like you’ve never won, play like you’ve never lost.
quotes.author: Diana Taurasi

quotes.text: The beauty of basketball is that it's a mix of individual skills and team collaboration.
quotes.author: Bob Ryan

quotes.text: When you play for the name on the front of the jersey, the name on the back will be remembered.
quotes.author: Unknown Coach

quotes.text: Every day is a great day for basketball.
quotes.author: Bill Walton

quotes.text: The key to winning is simple: It’s about heart and hustle.
quotes.author: Kevin Garnett

quotes.text: Basketball is life with the volume turned up.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.text: Coaches win practices, players win games.
quotes.author: Red Holzman

quotes.text: Basketball is a dance between skill and instinct.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.text: Preparation is the key to success. If you fail to prepare, you prepare to fail.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: You can’t win unless you learn how to lose.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.text: Basketball is not just about scoring points. It’s about making the right plays at the right time.
quotes.author: Chris Paul

quotes.text: Basketball is about getting buckets, but it’s also about making memories.
quotes.author: Jackie MacMullan
